STAT 155 Notes Macalester Statistics Faculty (Heggeseth, Myint, Grinde) Updated: 2020-08-18 Preface This book contains notes for STAT 155 at Macalester College. It contains definitions, data examples, and R code explanations that provide a foundation for the activities we will do in class. This is a living document, which will get updated throughout the semester. When you find typos or have clarifying questions, please email bheggese@macalester.edu, lmyint@macalester.edu, or kgrinde@macalester.edu as soon as possible. Acknowledgments These notes would not be possible without the bookdown package and the many open-source R packages used throughout the text. We thank the developers of these packages for making this work possible. The structure of this book is strongly influenced by the bookdown text written by Yihui Xie.
